    • 方法详细资料

      • updateDataNode

        public void updateDataNode(java.lang.String serviceName,
                  java.lang.String registryHost,
                  int registryPort,
                  int numChunker,
                  long timestamp,
                  boolean logable)
        Call by heartbeats function to update data nodes.
        参数:
        serviceName - the service name of data node.
        registryHost - registry host of data node.
        registryPort - registry port of data node.
        numChunker - number of chunker of data node.
        timestamp - time stamp of this operation.
        logable - if need to log.

      • removeDataNode

        public void removeDataNode(java.lang.String serviceName,
                  boolean logable)
        Remove data node from index if lose connection of data node.
        参数:
        serviceName - service name of data node.
        logable - if need to log.

      • createFile

        public SDDFSFile createFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                   int replication,
                   boolean logable)
        Create file in distributed file system.
        参数:
        fileName - file name of data node.
        replication - number of replication.
        logable - if need to log.
        返回:
        Reference of SDDFSFile.

      • getFile

        public SDDFSFile getFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Get reference of file in DFS.
        参数:
        fileName - filename of data node.
        返回:
        Reference of SDDFSFile.

      • listFiles

        public SDDFSFile[] listFiles()
        List all files in DFS.
        返回:
        Array of SDDFSFiles.

      • deleteFile

        public void deleteFile(java.lang.String serviceName,
              boolean logable)
        Delete file from DFS.
        参数:
        serviceName - service name of data node.
        logable - if need to log.

      • distributeFile

        public void distributeFile(long fileID,
                  boolean logable)
        Distribute files into data nodes.
        参数:
        fileID - file to be distributed.
        logable - if need to log.

      • getFileID

        public long getFileID(java.lang.String filename)
        Get file id from index.
        参数:
        filename - filename of data node.
        返回:
        file ID.

      • getBlocks

        public SDDFSDataBlock[] getBlocks(java.lang.String filename,
                         int size,
                         long offset)
        Given filename, offset of file and size of data, return data blocks. that describe where the data is.
        参数:
        filename -
        size -
        offset -
        返回:
